sourcesContent:
import {
  Modal,
  ModalOverlay,
  ModalContent,
  ModalHeader,
  ModalFooter,
  ModalBody,
  ModalCloseButton,
} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { Flex, Input, Text, Grid, Center, Button, useDisclosure} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { useContext } from 'react'
import DataContext from '../context/DataContext'


export default function ModalDrawer() {
  // let { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
  
  let{isItOpen,  onClose, setData ,data} = useContext(DataContext)
  if(data[0]===""){
    isItOpen = true
  }

  function handleChange(event){
    let{name, value} = event.target

    setData(prev=>{
      return{...prev,[name]:value}
    })

  }
  return (  
    <>
      {/* <Button onClick={onOpen}>Open Modal</Button> */}

      <Modal isOpen={isItOpen} onClose={onClose}>
        <ModalOverlay />
        <ModalContent>
          <ModalHeader>Set your Data</ModalHeader>
          <ModalCloseButton />
          <ModalBody>
            <Grid templateColumns='repeat(3, 1fr)' columnGap="3rem" rowGap="1rem">
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                0 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["0"]} name="0" />
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                1 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["1"]} name="1"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                2 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["2"]} name="2"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                3 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["3"]} name="3"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                4 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["4"]} name="4"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                5 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["5"]} name="5"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                6 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["6"]} name="6"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                7 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["7"]} name="7"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                8 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["8"]} name="8"/>
              </Flex>
              <Flex w="100%" justify={'space-evenly'} align={"center"} fontSize="18px">
                9 :
                <Input type="text" maxlength="1" w="45px" onChange={handleChange}  value={data["9"]} name="9"/>
              </Flex>
            </Grid>
          </ModalBody>

          <ModalFooter>
            <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
              Close
            </Button>
            <Button variant='ghost' onClick={()=>setData(1)}>Secondary Action</Button>
          </ModalFooter>
        </ModalContent>
      </Modal>
    </>
  )
}
